THIS GAME ITS A JEWEL. Works perfectly in my Windows 7 64bits. Installed, played ans finish without any prob. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. (Not a game for little kids: it's not an easy game ;)

Thank you very much! So sad that the original version is so expensive! If it's 25$ or 30$ I would bought, but with 1 dollar to 1,70 brazilian reais, 50$plus shipping plus 60% of taxes if the customs catch it, no way.
